changelog:
[Syberia]
- Ambient play with history and QS tile
- Privacy guard from LineageOS
- Navbar pixel animation
- Brightness slider OnePlus drawables
- Full navbar gestures from DU
- Navbar Pulse visualizer from DU
- Statusbar notification ticker
- Lockscreen charging animation
- Snap camera from LineageOS
- Partial screenshot come back
- Power-off alarm
- Launcher: various fixes and improvements
- Stock recents rounded corners
- Turbo (Battery usage prediction)
- Update translations
- expanded desktop
- launcher: rework, new gestures, Google search bar etc ..
- recents icon pack support
- less notifications sounds
- show battery temperature in battery settings
- 4G instead of LTE statusbar option
